casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bobby Daryl McGIRT. No. 390P06-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Floyd M. Lewis, Assistant Attorney General, Susan Doyle, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 641 S.E.2d 867.

*640The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of May 2007 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
